body.name: Hoctieon 2 Tier End Table, Small Night Table, Narrow Side Table with Storage, Nightstand for Small Spaces, Living Room, Bedroom, Sofa Couch, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 25 - March 1 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【2-tier Storage & Enough Capacity】The open lower provides a storage solution for remotes, your favorite books, glasses, medicines and other necessaries at hand. The wide top is perfect for displaying a lamp, clock, potted plant or photo frame to offer warmth and personalized decoration.

【Strong & Stable】Rust-proof square tube frame and sturdy table top can support heavy objects easily. There are 4 adjustable feet to adjust the height of table slightly when the local surface is not flat. In addition, the pad is made of plastic which can effectively prevent the floor from being scratched.

【Multiple Uses】This small end table can works great as night stand in your bedroom to hold bedside lamp, phones and eye masks, sofa side table in the living room to put snacks and remote control on hand, casual table in the garden or patio, it only takes little floor space but meets your daily demands.

【Industrial Style】 Giving an industrial look to any space, from the living room to the bedroom, this side table has a clean, understated design while making an impressive statement with its warm rustic brown tone and matte black steel accent.
【Easy to Assemble】 Completely assembled in 10 minutes, no additional tools required. Tighten the screws into place and this side table can be easily assembled at home or in the office.
body.description: Hoctieon Small End Table for for Small Spaces A Good Balance of Artistry and Practicality The small end table can be placed next to a sofa, next to a bed, or used as a nightstand in a small space. This small side table is sturdy and solid, made of black steel tubing with smooth, rich wood grain panels in a rustic brown finish. Two flat panels are designed to meet your storage needs. This vintage minimalist end table will add an elegant touch to home decor. 1. Color: Rustic Brown 2. Dimension: 15.4" x 11.4" x 19.7" 3. Product Weight: 7 lb 4. Assembly Details: Assembly required, tools are provided. 5. 5. Number of Items: 1 End Table

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1-Set End Table Your Comfort is Our Lifelong Pursuit. About Hoctieon: Combining vintage and minimalist furniture, Hoctieon brings modern design and is dedicated to making your home a unique and comfortable environment. Hoctieon can easily meet your home's needs for space-saving and convenient living. Hoctieon is willing to help you solve any problem makes your Hoctieon Experience as great as possible. Hoctieon Small End Table for for Small Spaces A Good Balance of Artistry and Practicality The small end table can be placed next to a sofa, next to a bed, or used as a nightstand in a small space. This small side table is sturdy and solid, made of black steel tubing with smooth, rich wood grain panels in a rustic brown finish. Two flat panels are designed to meet your storage needs. This vintage minimalist end table will add an elegant touch to home decor. 1. Color: Rustic Brown 2. Dimension: 15.4" x 11.4" x 19.7" 3. Product Weight: 7 lb 4. Assembly Details: Assembly required, tools are provided. 5. 5. Number of Items: 1 End Table

The Details Show: High Quality Vintage Color Coard It is made of high-grade MDF with powder powder-coated metal frame for durability and long life. Wire Pattern Design The joint of the table plate and the table leg achieve the beauty of the wire pattern design. Adjustable Foot Pads The design of adjustable feet makes the table more stable and avoids the instability of the table caused by the tilt of the ground.

Product Application Scenarios: Side table in the Office This side table can be used as a printer stand and it can be placed in your study room, you can put the printer on it behind the desk, and your books have enough storage, so the storage device is functional. Side table in the Living Room This side table can be placed in any corner of the living room, not occupying space, while silently acting as a decorative role in the corner of the overall home. Side table in the Bedroom The side table can be placed next to the bed in the bedroom. Before going to sleep at night, a small lamp can be placed on the side table to facilitate reading before going to bed, while the side table has enough space to place cell phones, tissue boxes, and other items.

Why Your Home May Need a Hoctieon Small End Table？ We offer simple, functional, easy-to-assemble furniture that meets the demands of modern living. We offer the most sincere service to create your ideal home, with comfort at your fingertips. With a reasonable budget, you can get delightful products that will enhance your living experience. Life is all about a book or a cup of tea at leisure, set a side table to add a touch of fragrance to your home. A small change is the beginning of a new atmosphere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little table!
reviews.reviewText: This table is sturdy and so cute! Perfect for anywhere in the house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble. It looked very nice and fits the location perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product is exactly what you expect for the price. It is sturdy enough though as it is holding my dog's large food container

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute little end table
reviews.reviewText: Good for small living rooms. This is pretty small though so you’d have space for basically 1 lamp and nothing else. We currently just use ours for remotes and a drink lol! It’s cute but sturdy still and I’d recommend for people getting their first place or dorms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very small but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Needed for heavy printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these little table
reviews.reviewText: I had been looking for two small tables. These filled the bill perfectly! Thank you for providing nice product at a sensible price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product measurements are not correct.
reviews.reviewText: I chose this table because I needed it to be a specific height - 20 inches. When I put it together, it ended up being almost 19.5 inches. Otherwise it is fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed for work. Small space to put my day Lilly. Works prefect.
